Your teachers might use Kerboodle to set assignments for you. To access an assignment:

  1. In the Assignments panel, click on the assignment title to open your assignment.
  2. Click on the Menu bar to get started.
  3. Click on the title of the resource to open it in the assignment window.
  4. Use the menu bar to move through the rest of the resources and complete the assignment.

If your teacher has asked for you to return a document as part of the assignment, please have a look at the online tutorial called Returning work as part of an Assignment.
